template.name: Template App Squid SNMP
template.description:
Template for monitoring Squid caching proxy via SNMP
You can discuss this template or leave feedback on our forum https://www.zabbix.com/forum/zabbix-suggestions-and-feedback/409339-discussion-thread-for-official-zabbix-template-squid
Template tooling version used: 0.38

item.name: Squid: Service ping
Squid: CPU usage
item.description: The percentage use of the CPU

item.name: Squid: File descriptor count - current used
item.description: Number of file descriptors in use

item.name: Squid: File descriptor count - current maximum
item.description: Highest number of file descriptors in use

item.name: Squid: Objects LRU expiration age
Squid: File descriptor count - current reserved
Squid: Cache swap current size
Squid: Objects unlinkd requests
Squid: File descriptor count - current available

trigger.name: Squid: Squid is running out of file descriptors (<{$SQUID.FILE.DESC.WARN.MIN})

item.name: Squid: DNS server replies per second
item.description: Number of external dns server replies

item.name: Squid: DNS server requests per second
item.description: Number of external dns server requests

item.name: Squid: DNS service time per 5 minutes
Squid: DNS service time per hour
Squid: FQDN cache hits per second
Squid: FQDN cache misses per second
Squid: FQDN cache requests per second
Squid: HTTP all service time per 5 minutes
item.description: HTTP all service time per 5 minutes

item.name: Squid: HTTP all service time per hour
item.description: HTTP all service time per hour

item.name: Squid: HTTP Errors sent per second
item.description: Number of HTTP Errors sent to clients

item.name: Squid: HTTP Hits sent from cache per second
item.description: Number of HTTP Hits sent to clients from cache

item.name: Squid: HTTP miss service time per 5 minutes
item.description: HTTP hit service time per 5 minutes

item.name: Squid: HTTP hit service time per hour
item.description: HTTP hit service time per hour

item.name: Squid: HTTP traffic received per second
item.description: Number of HTTP traffic received from clients

item.name: Squid: HTTP miss service time per 5 minutes
item.description: HTTP miss service time per 5 minutes

item.name: Squid: HTTP miss service time per hour
item.description: HTTP miss service time per hour

item.name: Squid: HTTP traffic sent per second
item.description: Number of HTTP traffic sent to clients

item.name: Squid: ICP traffic received per second
Squid: ICP traffic transmitted per second
Squid: ICP messages received per second
Squid: ICP messages sent per second
Squid: ICP query service time per 5 minutes
item.description: ICP query service time per 5 minutes

item.name: Squid: ICP query service time per hour
item.description: ICP query service time per hour

item.name: Squid: ICP reply service time per 5 minutes
item.description: ICP reply service time per 5 minutes

item.name: Squid: ICP reply service time per hour
item.description: ICP reply service time per hour

item.name: Squid: IP cache hits per second
Squid: IP cache misses per second
Squid: IP cache requests per second
Squid: Memory maximum resident size
Squid: Memory maximum cache size
item.description: The value of the cache_mem parameter

item.name: Squid: Memory cache usage
Squid: Objects count
item.description: Number of objects stored by the cache

item.name: Squid: HTTP requests received per second
Squid: Byte hit ratio per 1 minute
Squid: Byte hit ratio per 5 minutes
Squid: Byte hit ratio per 1 hour
Squid: Request hit ratio per 1 minute
Squid: Request hit ratio per 5 minutes
Squid: Request hit ratio per 1 hour
Squid: Cache swap high water mark
Squid: Cache swap low water mark
Squid: Cache swap directory size
item.description: The total of the cache_dir space allocated

item.name: Squid: Sys page faults per second
Squid: Uptime
item.description: The Uptime of the cache in timeticks (in hundredths of a second) with preprocessing

item.name: Squid: Version

trigger.name: Squid: Squid version has been changed
trigger.description: Squid version has changed. Ack to close.

macro.description: The threshold for minimum number of available file descriptors
The threshold for sys page faults rate in percent of received HTTP requests
SNMP community allowed by ACL in squid.conf

trigger.name: Squid: High sys page faults rate (>{$SQUID.PAGE.FAULT.WARN}% of received HTTP requests)

trigger.expression: {Template App Squid SNMP:squid[cacheCurrentSwapSize].last()}>{Template App Squid SNMP:squid[cacheSwapHighWM].last()}*{Template App Squid SNMP:squid[cacheSwapMaxSize].last()}/100
trigger.name: Squid: Swap usage is more than high watermark (>{ITEM.VALUE2}%)

trigger.expression: {Template App Squid SNMP:squid[cacheCurrentSwapSize].last()}>{Template App Squid SNMP:squid[cacheSwapLowWM].last()}*{Template App Squid SNMP:squid[cacheSwapMaxSize].last()}/100
trigger.name: Squid: Swap usage is more than low watermark (>{ITEM.VALUE2}%)
